label: Description
value: An old man is playing a harp. A figure of a boy, holding a scroll, is singing; a dog is asleep on the left. The peasants, either standing or sitting, are gathered around the musicians. The background shows a view of a mountainous landscape with trees and houses. Verso: the upper part of a sketch depicting a mountainous landscape with trees and houses.
